mapper.insert: insert into checkoutcomebill (sn, vdate, status, totalAmount, totalNumber, saleas_id, depot_id, member_id) values (#{sn}, #{vdate}, #{status}, #{totalAmount}, #{totalNumber}, #{salesman.id}, #{depotId}, #{member.id})
mapper.update: update checkoutcomebill set sn = #{sn}, vdate = #{vdate}, status = #{status}, totalAmount = #{totalAmount}, totalNumber = #{totalNumber}, saleas_id = #{salesman.id}, depot_id = #{depotId}, member_id = #{member.id} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, sn, vdate, status, totalAmount, totalNumber, saleas_id, depot_id, member_id from checkoutcomebill
